00001 #include "dsCMatrix.h"

00003 SEXP dsCMatrix_chol(SEXP x, SEXP pivot)
00004 {
00005     CHM_FR N = AS_CHM_FR(dsCMatrix_Cholesky(x, pivot, ScalarLogical(FALSE),
00006                                             ScalarLogical(FALSE)));
00007     /* Must use a copy; cholmod_factor_to_sparse modifies first arg. */
00008     CHM_FR Ncp = cholmod_copy_factor(N, &c);
00009     CHM_SP L = cholmod_factor_to_sparse(Ncp, &c);
00010     CHM_SP R = cholmod_transpose(L, /*values*/ 1, &c);
00011     SEXP ans = PROTECT(chm_sparse_to_SEXP(R, 1/*do_free*/, 1/*uploT*/, 0/*Rkind*/,
00012                                           "N"/*diag*/, GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym)));
00013     R_CheckStack();
00014 
00015     cholmod_free_factor(&Ncp, &c);
00016     cholmod_free_sparse(&L, &c);
00017     if (asLogical(pivot)) {
00018         SEXP piv = PROTECT(allocVector(INTSXP, N->n));
00019         int *dest = INTEGER(piv), *src = (int*)N->Perm, i;
00020 
00021         for (i = 0; i < N->n; i++) dest[i] = src[i] + 1;
00022         setAttrib(ans, install("pivot"), piv);
00023         /* FIXME: Because of the cholmod_factor -> S4 obj ->
00024          * cholmod_factor conversions, the value of N->minor will
00025          * always be N->n.  Change as_cholmod_factor and
00026          * chm_factor_to_SEXP to keep track of Minor.
00027          */
00028         setAttrib(ans, install("rank"), ScalarInteger((size_t) N->minor));
00029         UNPROTECT(1);
00030     }
00031     UNPROTECT(1);
00032     return ans;
00033 }
00034 
00035 SEXP dsCMatrix_Cholesky(SEXP Ap, SEXP permP, SEXP LDLp, SEXP superP)
00036 {
00037     char fname[12] = "spdCholesky"; /* template for factorization name */
00038     /* S|s : super or not
00039      * P|p : permuted or not
00040      * D|d :  LDL' or not (= LL')
00041      */
00042     int perm = asLogical(permP), LDL = asLogical(LDLp), super = asLogical(superP);
00043     SEXP Chol;
00044     CHM_SP A;
00045     CHM_FR L;
00046     int sup, ll;
00047 
00048     if (super) fname[0] = 'S';
00049     if (perm) fname[1] = 'P';
00050     if (LDL) fname[2] = 'D';
00051     Chol = get_factors(Ap, fname);
00052     if (Chol != R_NilValue) return Chol; /* return a cached factor */
00053 
00054     A = AS_CHM_SP(Ap);
00055     R_CheckStack();
00056     if (!A->stype)
00057         error("Non-symmetric matrix passed to dsCMatrix_chol");
00058 
00059     sup = c.supernodal;
00060     ll = c.final_ll;
00061 
00062     c.final_ll = !LDL;  /* leave as LL' or form LDL' */
00063     c.supernodal = super ? CHOLMOD_SUPERNODAL : CHOLMOD_SIMPLICIAL;
00064 
00065     if (perm) {
00066         L = cholmod_analyze(A, &c); /* get fill-reducing permutation */
00067     } else {                        /* require identity permutation */
00068         int nmethods = c.nmethods, ord0 = c.method[0].ordering,
00069             postorder = c.postorder;
00070         c.nmethods = 1;
00071         c.method[0].ordering = CHOLMOD_NATURAL;
00072         c.postorder = FALSE;
00073         L = cholmod_analyze(A, &c);
00074         c.nmethods = nmethods; c.method[0].ordering = ord0;
00075         c.postorder = postorder;
00076     }
00077     if (!cholmod_factorize(A, L, &c))
00078         error(_("Cholesky factorization failed"));
00079     c.supernodal = sup; /* restore previous setting */
00080     c.final_ll = ll;
00081     Chol = set_factors(Ap, chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 1), fname);
00082     return Chol;
00083 }
00084 
00085 static
00086 SEXP get_factor_pattern(SEXP obj, char *pat, int offset)
00087 {
00088     SEXP facs = GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_factorSym), nms;
00089     int i;
00090 
00091     if (!LENGTH(facs)) /* Fast return for empty factor slot: */
00092         return R_NilValue;
00093     nms = getAttrib(facs, R_NamesSymbol);
00094     for (i = 0; i < LENGTH(nms); i++) {
00095         const char *nm = CHAR(STRING_ELT(nms, i));
00096         if (strlen(nm) > offset && !strcmp(pat + offset, nm + offset))
00097             return VECTOR_ELT(facs, i);
00098     }
00099     return R_NilValue;
00100 }
00101 
00102 SEXP dsCMatrix_Csparse_solve(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00103 {
00104     SEXP Chol = get_factor_pattern(a, "...Cholesky", 3);
00105     CHM_FR L;
00106     CHM_SP cx, cb = AS_CHM_SP(b);
00107     R_CheckStack();
00108 
00109     if (Chol == R_NilValue) /* compute (and cache) "sPDCholesky" */
00110         Chol = dsCMatrix_Cholesky(a,
00111                                   ScalarLogical(1),  /* permuted  : "P" */
00112                                   ScalarLogical(1),  /* LDL'      : "D" */
00113                                   ScalarLogical(0)); /* simplicial: "s" */
00114     L = AS_CHM_FR(Chol);
00115     R_CheckStack();
00116     cx = cholmod_spsolve(CHOLMOD_A, L, cb, &c);
00117     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(cx, /*do_free*/ 1, /*uploT*/ 0,
00118                               /*Rkind*/ 0, /*diag*/ "N",
00119                               /*dimnames = */ R_NilValue);
00120 }
00121 
00122 SEXP dsCMatrix_matrix_solve(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00123 {
00124     SEXP Chol = get_factor_pattern(a, "...Cholesky", 3);
00125     CHM_FR L;
00126     CHM_DN cx, cb = AS_CHM_DN(PROTECT(mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b)));
00127     R_CheckStack();
00128 
00129     if (Chol == R_NilValue) /* compute (and cache) "sPDCholesky" */
00130         Chol = dsCMatrix_Cholesky(a,
00131                                   ScalarLogical(1),  /* permuted  : "P" */
00132                                   ScalarLogical(1),  /* LDL'      : "D" */
00133                                   ScalarLogical(0)); /* simplicial: "s" */
00134     L = AS_CHM_FR(Chol);
00135     R_CheckStack();
00136     cx = cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_A, L, cb, &c);
00137     UNPROTECT(1);
00138     return chm_dense_to_SEXP(cx, 1, 0, /*dimnames = */ R_NilValue);
00139 }
00140 
00141 /* Needed for printing dsCMatrix objects */
00142 /* FIXME: Create a more general version of this operation: also for lsC, (dsR?),..
00143 *         e.g. make  compressed_to_dgTMatrix() in ./dgCMatrix.c work for dsC */
00144 SEXP dsCMatrix_to_dgTMatrix(SEXP x)
00145 {
00146     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP(x);
00147     CHM_SP Afull = cholmod_copy(A, /*stype*/ 0, /*mode*/ 1, &c);
00148     CHM_TR At = cholmod_sparse_to_triplet(Afull, &c);
00149     R_CheckStack();
00150 
00151     if (!A->stype)
00152         error("Non-symmetric matrix passed to dsCMatrix_to_dgTMatrix");
00153     cholmod_free_sparse(&Afull, &c);
00154     return chm_triplet_to_SEXP(At, 1, /*uploT*/ 0, /*Rkind*/ 0, "",
00155                                GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00156 }
